show.title: Ms.Hindi to Mrs.Thamizh- The unknown princess
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/qea66c
show.description:
"Our Hero and his colleagues team go to North India to kidnap the girl whom his friend is in love with. They Mistakenly Kidnaps the girl who came to see the festival. Hero Forced to Marry Heroine to Regret his Mistake. The hero's girlfriend and the heroine's family get furious after finding out about their Marriage. In between days the heroine falls in love with the man who made her breathe the independent air...! Meanwhile, the hero is unable to forget his Girlfriend whom he fell in love with. 

What happens If our hero knows our heroine is a princess??

Can a Woman's First Love Wave Meet its Sea shore?? "
